amendment.description: To ensure that savings associated with legislation that reduces overpayments to medicare advantage plans is reserved for deficit reduction and to strengthen the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 258 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 258 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S2937; text: CR S2937) To ensure that savings associated with legislation that reduces overpayments to medicare advantage plans is reserved for deficit reduction and to strengthen the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 258 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 258 proposed by Senator Feingold.
